text: The 1966 ISF Men's World Championship was an international softball tournament and the inaugural World Championship. The tournament was held in Mexico City, Mexico. Eleven nations competed. ==Final standings== {| class=wikitable style="text-align:center; font-size:95%" |- !width=25|Rk !width=170|Team !width=25| !width=25| |- |1 |align=left| |12||0 |- |2 |align=left| |9||3 |- |3 |align=left| |10||3 |- |4 |align=left| |7||6 |- !colspan="8"|Failed to qualify for Playoffs |- |5 |align=left| |5||5 |- |6 |align=left| |5||5 |- |7 |align=left| |3||7 |- |8 |align=left| |3||7 |- |9 |align=left| |3||7 |- |10 |align=left| |2||8 |- |11 |align=left| |1||9 |} ==References== ISF Men's World Championship 1966 ISF Men's World Championship Category:Men's Softball World Championship Category:Sports competitions in Mexico City Category:1960s in Mexico City
title: 1966 Men's Softball World Championship
